output.organizationTypeJustification: The organization hosts multiple community-driven Julia packages for control systems without commercial, academic, or corporate branding, indicating a collaborative open-source software community.
disciplineJustification: The repositories focus on control theory and control system design, which are core topics in systems science and engineering.
The implementation of control algorithms in Julia and development of software tools reflect computer engineering practices.
